subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester United had to rely on a penalty shootout to beat Portsmouth in the Community Shield, 3-1, in Wembley, England. Playing without Cristiano Ronaldo and Wayne Rooney, United hit the bar, had several good chances saved and was denied what looked like a penalty as Portsmouth forced a 0-0 draw in the traditional season opener.
